nars.nar

Class Default.AbstractCycle

  • java.lang.Object
    • nars.nar.Default.AbstractCycle
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.function.Consumer<BLink<Concept>>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Default.DefaultCycle
    Enclosing class:
    Default

    public abstract static class Default.AbstractCycle
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.util.function.Consumer<BLink<Concept>>
    The original deterministic memory cycle implementation that is currently used as a standard for development and testing.
